title: How to See Archived Posts on Instagram on PC or Mac

steps.title: Go to https://www.bluestacks.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.bluestacks.com/ in a web browser. Popular ones include Firefox and Chrome . This download is for an Android emulator, so you can use your Android apps from your computer as if you were using an Android device!

steps.title: Click the green Download BlueStacks button.
steps.content: Click the green Download BlueStacks button. The browser will automatically detect if you’re using Mac or Windows and will download accordingly. A pop-up box will appear for the download location.

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . The installer will save in the location you picked in the previous step, which is most likely the Downloads folder .

steps.title: Click the installed file and follow the on-screen steps to install BlueStacks.
steps.content: Click the installed file and follow the on-screen steps to install BlueStacks. Click Yes to allow changes if you're prompted. Read and accept all terms before agreeing and continuing the installation process.

steps.title: Click Install Now.
steps.content: Click Install Now . You will see a progress bar as the download progresses. After downloading the app, you will see a progress bar as the installation progresses.

steps.title: Open BlueStacks.
steps.content: Open BlueStacks. You can find this in your Start Menu or Applications folder. The first time you launch BlueStacks, it will take a while. The app will ask you to sign in to a Google account or create one . You will see a list of installed apps you can use with BlueStacks.

steps.title: Click in the search bar.
steps.content: Click in the search bar. You’ll find this in the upper right corner of the window. A list of most-searched games will drop down.

steps.title: Type “Instagram” and press ↵ Enter or ⏎ Return.
steps.content: Type “Instagram” and press ↵ Enter or ⏎ Return . This will open a new tab labeled “App Center” in your app window of search results.

steps.title: Click Instagram by Instagram.
steps.content: Click Instagram by Instagram. A window from the Google Play Store will open on the details page of Instagram. If you didn’t sign in to a Google account or create one, you will be asked again. You need a Google account to download Android apps.

steps.title: Click the green Open button.
steps.content: Click the green Open button. The Instagram app will launch in BlueStacks. Your app window may shrink to indicate the size of a phone.

steps.title: Click Log in or Create New Account.
steps.content: Click Log in or Create New Account . You can login with your Facebook account or your Instagram email and password .

steps.title: Click your profile image or the silhouette .
steps.content: Click your profile image or the silhouette . This is in the lower right of your screen and your profile page will open.

steps.title: Click ☰.
steps.content: Click ☰ . It's in the upper right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Click Archive.
steps.content: Click Archive . This is usually the first listing in the menu next to a rewind icon. A list of your archived Stories will appear.

steps.title: Click the Stories Archive drop-down.
steps.content: Click the Stories Archive drop-down. A menu will drop down.

steps.title: Click Posts Archive.
steps.content: Click Posts Archive . A list of your archived posts will appear.

steps.title: Click a post to view it.
steps.content: Click a post to view it. Your post and all its original comments will load. [1] X Research source To unarchive a post, click the three-dot menu icon in the top right corner of the post and click Show on Profile . It'll appear back in the timeline of your profile where it originally was.
